attributes.action: Send MPs out of the Chamber for vocally disruptive and childish behaviour.
attributes.additional_details: Here's a link (there are many others) to illustrate my point: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6xJlPO5jqE8
attributes.background: With over 4 million children in poverty, cuts to police, NHS & schools, a surge in knife crime & homelessness plus the severity of Brexit, I and many I know are sick of MPs behaving like chimps at a tea party in the Commons. It is boorish, juvenile and disrespectful to speakers and us, the public.

rejection.details:
The Speaker of the House of Commons is responsible for maintaining order in the House of Commons, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you would like a specific change to the rules of the House of Commons, you could start a new petition asking for that change.
